page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: This area covers{Honiley,Beausale}and the north west of{Kenilworth.} {Honiley}is a small settlement of 8-10 houses and two farms. It has a church and a bus-service. Honiley Hall, once a family residence is now a residential centre for school visits. {Beausale}is a larger settlement of twenty to thirty houses and four farms. It also has a bus-service and a youth club. The houses in the part of {Kenilworth}included in the survey range from Tudor lines to 1980's houses and flats. In this area there is also a Post Office,General Stores,Tea Room and Steak-House,Upholsterer and Filter Tube Manufacturer.
